'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 1.0]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2020-10-20 18:00:00 &ndash; 2020-11-10 14:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the 5-star weapons [[Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds]] (Catalyst) and [[Wolf's Gravestone]] (Claymore) as well as 4-star weapons [[Sacrificial Sword]] (Sword), [[Sacrificial Bow]] (Bow), [[Sacrificial Greatsword]] (Claymore), [[Sacrificial Fragments]] (Catalyst), and [[Dragon's Bane]] (Polearm) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
